product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Digital Control
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive control panel
• 🔄 Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Towels
• 📱 LED digital display showing time remaining and cycle status
• 🌡️ Advanced temperature control with various heat settings
• 🚪 Large capacity drum with spacious door opening for easy loading/unloading
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and built-in cleaning reminder
• 📏 Space-saving compact design perfect for apartments and small homes
• 🔊 Sound alert when cycle completes
• ⚙️ Multiple fabric care options with adjustable drying preferences

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, appliance-focused layout designed to advertise a compact dryer. The background showcases a dark blue gradient enhanced with a subtle white grid and concentric circles radiating from the center, giving depth and structure to the layout. The product image is centrally aligned, creating a focal point. A bold title (`heading`) rests at the top, immediately identifying the product, while a soft, inviting tagline (`tagline`) sits just below. Key selling points (`description`) are listed in a horizontal line beneath the image. A brightly colored price tag (`price`) grabs attention, followed by a prominent call-to-action button (`cta`) with a contrasting background (`cta_background`) at the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #152A45
- Steel Blue: #2E4B6F
- Sky Blue: #4DA9FF
- Soft Blue Text: #BAD7F5
- Bright Yellow: #FFD166
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image presents a modern Insignia dryer with a clean, minimalistic appearance dominated by white (#F5F5F5) and black (#1A1A1A) tones. The front panel effectively contrasts these shades, highlighting the sleek digital display and control dial. Subtle chrome/silver (#C0C0C0) accents on the knob add sophistication. The UI display emits a soft cool blue (#4FC3F7), drawing viewer attention without overwhelming the design. Light gray (#D3D3D3) is used for instructional markings and vents, giving balance. The palette blends high-contrast neutrals with standout accents, making the appliance feel high-tech and premium. This color approach would translate well into a clean, futuristic advertisement banner.
